successes.title: Pairs: A New Classic Pub Game
successes.description: Pairs is a fast and easy card game by James Ernest, with many versions of art and rules, including four decks based on the works of Patrick Rothfuss.

Pledges.description: Supporter: You're glad this project is happening and you want to lend your support. Thanks! Backers at this level will receive an exclusive Pairs logo sticker and our thanks.
One Deck: You'd like a copy of this game when it comes out. Hooray! Backers at this level will receive one deck and the sticker listed above.
Two Decks: You like this game even more! Backers at this level will receive two decks and a sticker.
Three Decks: You get the idea. Backers at this level will receive three decks and a sticker.

Four Decks: But wait, there's more. At the $42 level, backers will receive four decks and a sticker, as well as a limited-edition "Good Luck" coin. This is a handsome 39mm metal coin with the Pairs logo, similar to the coins that we made for Get Lucky.
Five Decks: Backers at this level will receive five decks, as well as the sticker and good luck coin mentioned above.
Six Decks: Backers at this level will receive six decks, as well as the sticker and good luck coin mentioned above.
Eight Decks: Hooray! Backers at this level will receive eight decks, as well as the sticker and coin mentioned above.

Nine Decks: Awesome! You know that your friends and neighbors will love this game as much as you do! At the $90 reward level, you receive nine decks, plus the sticker and coin listed above. You will also get an exclusive 4x6 Pairs postcard featuring our favorite piece of Shane Tyree art.
Ten Decks: Huzzah! At the $100 reward level, you receive ten decks, plus the sticker, coin and 4x6 Pairs postcard listed above.

Twelve Decks: Amazing! You are a true sponsor of this game, and you're happy to share it with everyone. At the $120 level, you receive 12 decks, plus the sticker and coin listed above. You will also get a second coin, and a 6 x 9 postcard signed by artist Shane Tyree.

PAX Pairs Party! Join us in Seattle for a celebration of pub games. Backers at this level will receive everything from the $120 level, plus two tickets to the Pairs release party. This will be one evening during PAX, August 28-31 in Seattle. Meet Patrick Rothfuss, Shane Tyree, James Ernest, and other special guests. Eat, drink, play games!
